dialogues.name: LK_welcome_01
dialogues.text:
Unleash your creativity,
and customise your very own F1 car

dialogues.name: LK_welcome_01_H
dialogues.text:
Unleash your creativity,
and customise your very own F1 helmet

dialogues.name: LK_tutorial_02
dialogues.text: Buckle up! Touch and drag to move the camera. Pinch to zoom in and out. See your car in all its glory

dialogues.name: LK_tutorial_02_H
dialogues.text: Buckle up! Touch and drag to move the camera. Pinch to zoom in and out. See your helmet in all its glory

dialogues.name: LK_tutorial_05
dialogues.text: First, pick a pattern that suits your style

dialogues.name: LK_tutorial_08
dialogues.text: Make your car stand out with your favorite colours

dialogues.name: LK_tutorial_08_H
dialogues.text: Make your helmet stand out with your favorite colours

dialogues.name: LK_tutorial_11
dialogues.text: Add your own custom tag to your car

dialogues.name: LK_tutorial_11_H
dialogues.text: Add your own custom tag to your helmet

dialogues.name: LK_tutorial_14
dialogues.text: Get race-ready with some sponsor decals

dialogues.name: LK_tutorial_17
dialogues.text: Your F1 design is being sprayed on...

dialogues.name: LK_tutorial_19
dialogues.text: From Screen to Steel, Design in motion. Want to see your ride come to life? Check it out in augmented reality

dialogues.name: LK_tutorial_19_H
dialogues.text: From Screen to Steel, Design in motion. Want to see your helmet come to life? Check it out in augmented reality

dialogues.name: LK_turndevice_02
dialogues.text:
This experience requires your device to be held portrait,
please turn to proceed.

dialogues.name: LK_info_prepping
dialogues.text:
We're fuelling up the F1 Paint Shop for you.
Please wait a moment...

dialogues.name: LK_final_01
dialogues.text:
Ready to roll? Hit ‘NEXT’ or go back to make changes.
Tap the red button to take a photo.

dialogues.name: LK_photo_iphoneusers
dialogues.text:
Tap the image to download.
iPhone users can tap and hold the photo to save to camera roll.

dialogues.name: LK_AR_welcome_2
dialogues.text: To enjoy the full AR experience, we need your permission to access your camera.

dialogues.name: LK_AR_cameraRequest_1
dialogues.text: To enjoy the full AR experience, we need your permission to access your camera.

dialogues.name: LK_AR_cameraError_1
dialogues.text: There's a error with your camera, try refreshing the page.

dialogues.name: LK_AR_findMarker_2
dialogues.text: Ready, set, scan! Point your camera at the image target to see your F1 car design come to life

dialogues.name: LK_AR_findMarker_3
dialogues.text: Ready, set, scan! Point your camera at the image target to see your F1 helmet design come to life

dialogues.name: LK_AR_explore_02
dialogues.text: Do a lap around the car to check out your design from all angles.

dialogues.name: LK_AR_explore_02_H
dialogues.text: Do a lap around the helmet to check out your design from all angles.

dialogues.name: LK_AR_share_02
dialogues.text: Tap or hold the camera button. Snap a pic or video. Share on socials.
